meanings.definition: A person who engages in wanton behavior.
meanings.sent1: The town was peaceful until the wantoners arrived and caused chaos.
meanings.sent2: The wantoners left a trail of destruction wherever they went.
meanings.sent3: The wantoners played pranks on each other all day long.
meanings.sent4: Her reckless driving made her the wantoners of the road.
meanings.sent5: The wantoners' wild parties were the talk of the town.

meanings.sent1: The wantoners gathered at the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of wantoners walking down the street.
meanings.sent3: The wantoners shared a big pizza for lunch.
meanings.sent4: The wantoners' laughter filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The wantoners enjoyed the sunny day at the beach.
